subject: Upgraded version
description_text:
Hi,

I just ordered Simsonn pro X ULTRA P3-H3. My Order #SSN2012.

I am struggeling to understand if i just bought the non-upgraded version since there also is a version called "Simsonn Pro X upgraded".

What is the diffrence between Ultra and upgraded? Is the ultra not upgraded with the shorter spring? If so, why do you even sell the non-upgraded version?

//Simen Asphaug

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 4185 中
